label: bike
caption: A group of demonstrators gathered on the sidewalk, holding signs and chanting slogans as they protested against a local issue. Amidst the commotion, a man in a bright yellow helmet rode his bike slowly through the crowd, carefully navigating around protesters who were stepping into the street to get a better view. The cyclist's yellow bicycle stood out amidst the sea of more muted clothing and signs, but he seemed focused on getting home after a long day at work.
